short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy direct links for Google Chat messages in one click. Supports direct messages, group chats and spaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Can enable the copy of direct links to Google Chat messages. Helpful for the teams in an organizational structure to share direct links to specific messages or threads from spaces and group chats they are part of.
